short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TAKLES helps you identify products and where to buy them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We know what it is to be watching your favorite show and finding something you want. With TAKLES you can pause your show, run our extension, and we will help you identify what it is and where to buy it.
